meaningMnemonic: As you can probably imagine, when you add the kanji <kanji>sick</kanji> to another word, you're saying what kind of <vocabulary>sickness</vocabulary> it is; you are mentioning what <vocabulary>disease</vocabulary> it is.
readingMnemonic: Since this is attached to other words, it's treated like jukugo and gets on'yomi treatment. This is the reading you learned with the kanji.
